alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Lake; Newton; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 16 at 4:18AM EST until December 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 to 60 mph gradually easing through this morning. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Indiana and north central and northeast Illinois, including Chicago and Rockford. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. The highest wind gusts will be prior to 7 AM this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down small trees and branches, as well as power lines. Scattered power outages will continue. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
